name: Treejer | Tree Profile
description:
About Treejer

Treejer is an open protocol connecting funders to rural planters worldwide. It uses Web 3.0 tools to empower communities protecting forests. Each tree is represented by a dynamic NFT on Polygon network. Learn more about Treejer Protocol here.


About This File

This file contains Treejer's "Tree Profile" UI design. The page shows information about every single tree in Treejer Protocol:


  • On top of the page, the NFT symbol is displayed
  • In the right sidebar, the NFT attributes are displayed
  • In the left sidebar, a generative story will be generated based on real-life and on-chain attributes of the tree
  • In the middle, people who have had an impact on the tree's life is are presented
  • The history of on-chain transactions related to this NFT tree is displayed at the bottom
  • If the tree is planted, a small box appears. It shows additional information about the tree's location


Please join our Discord community to get involved in building Treejer in the Open. We're Planters Without Borders! :)
